data.CycleConditions: Character() and Enemy() and not Dead()

data.SpellSuccess: DealDamage(MainMeleeWeapon, MainMeleeWeaponDamageType); ExecuteWeaponFunctors(MainHand); DealDamage(2d6, Lightning); ApplyStatus(PRONE, 100, 1, , , ,not SavingThrow(Ability.Strength, SourceSpellDC()))
DealDamage(MainMeleeWeapon, MainMeleeWeaponDamageType); ExecuteWeaponFunctors(MainHand); ApplyStatus(FRIGHTENED,100,2, , , ,not SavingThrow(Ability.Wisdom, SourceSpellDC()));DealDamage(1d6,Psychic)

data.CycleConditions: Character() and Enemy() and not Dead()
Character() and Enemy() and not Dead()

data.SpellProperties: GROUND:DealDamage(MainMeleeWeapon, MainMeleeWeaponDamageType); GROUND:ExecuteWeaponFunctors(MainHand); GROUND:DealDamage(OffhandMeleeWeapon, OffhandMeleeWeaponDamageType); GROUND:ExecuteWeaponFunctors(OffHand)
data.SpellSuccess: DealDamage(MainMeleeWeapon, MainMeleeWeaponDamageType); ExecuteWeaponFunctors(MainHand); DealDamage(OffhandMeleeWeapon, OffhandMeleeWeaponDamageType); ExecuteWeaponFunctors(OffHand)
IF(not SavingThrow(Ability.Strength, ManeuverSaveDC())):Force(5); DealDamage(MainMeleeWeapon + ResourceRoll(SuperiorityDie,1), MainMeleeWeaponDamageType); ExecuteWeaponFunctors(MainHand)
DealDamage(MainMeleeWeapon, MainMeleeWeaponDamageType); ExecuteWeaponFunctors(MainHand); DealDamage(1d6, Fire); ApplyStatus(SEARING_SMITE, 100, 10)
DealDamage(MainMeleeWeapon, MainMeleeWeaponDamageType); ExecuteWeaponFunctors(MainHand); DealDamage(2d6, Fire); ApplyStatus(SEARING_SMITE, 100, 10)

DealDamage(MainMeleeWeapon, MainMeleeWeaponDamageType); IF(HasAdvantage() or (HasAllyWithinRange('SG_Incapacitated',2) and not HasDisadvantage())):DealDamage(1d6*(((Level-1)/2)+1), MainMeleeWeaponDamageType);ExecuteWeaponFunctors(MainHand)

data.TargetConditions: not Self() and TargetSizeEqualOrSmaller(Size.Large) and not Grounded() and (not Item() or (IsMovable() and CanMove(context.Target, context.Source, false)))
Character() and not Dead() and not Tagged('UNDEAD')
data.CycleConditions: Ally() and not Dead() and not Tagged('UNDEAD')

data.TargetConditions: Player() and not Dead() and not Summon()

Character() and not Self() and (not Enemy() or Player()) and (HasStatus('SG_Prone') or HasStatus('SG_Restrained') or HasStatus('PRONE') or HasStatus('SLEEPING') or HasStatus('SLEEP') or HasStatus('ENSNARING_STRIKE') or HasStatus('WEB') or HasStatus('DOWNED') or HasStatus('BURNING'))
Character() and not HasStatus('FAERIE_FIRE') and not (not Player(context.Source) and IsConcentrating(context.Source))

data.SpellSuccess: DealDamage(1d4, Bludgeoning, Nonmagical, Nonlethal);TARGET:IF(LethalHP() and not Player()):ApplyStatus(KNOCKED_OUT,100,-1);TARGET:IF(LethalHP() and Player()):DealDamage(1,Bludgeoning);TARGET:IF(LethalHP() and Player()):Stabilize()
data.TargetConditions: Character() and not Self() and not Summon() and not Tagged('UNDEAD') and not Tagged('CONSTRUCT')
data.CycleConditions: Enemy() and not Self() and not Summon()

data.SpellRoll: Item() or not Enemy() or not SavingThrow(Ability.Dexterity, SourceSpellDC())

data.CycleConditions: Ally() and not Dead() and not WearingArmor()

not Item() and not Dead() and not Enemy() and not (not Player(context.Source) and IsConcentrating(context.Source))

data.CycleConditions: Character() and not Ally() and not Dead()

data.SpellProperties: ApplyStatus(HEAT_METAL_DISADVANTAGE,100,1);IF(IsMetalItem()):ApplyStatus(HEAT_METAL,100,10);IF(not IsMetalItem() and HasMetalWeapon(context.Target, true)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(MainHand,HEAT_METAL,100,10);IF(not IsMetalItem() and not HasMetalWeapon(context.Target, true) and HasMetalWeapon(context.Target, false)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(OffHand,HEAT_METAL,100,10);IF(not IsMetalItem() and not HasMetalWeapon(context.Target, true) and not HasMetalWeapon(context.Target, false) and HasMetalArmor()):ApplyEquipmentStatus(Breast,HEAT_METAL,100,10);IF(Character()):DealDamage(2d8,Fire);ApplyStatus(SELF,HEAT_METAL_TECHNICAL,100,10)
data.TargetConditions: IsMetalItem() or HasMetalWeapon(context.Target, true) or HasMetalWeapon(context.Target, false) or HasMetalArmor()

Character() and (HasStatus('HEAT_METAL',GetActiveWeapon(context.Target, true),context.Source) or HasStatus('HEAT_METAL',GetActiveWeapon(context.Target, false),context.Source) or HasStatus('HEAT_METAL',GetActiveArmor(context.Target),context.Source))

data.SpellSuccess: IF(not HasStatus('SHIELD_MASTER') or not HasActionResource('ReactionActionPoint', 1, 0, false)):DealDamage(2d10,Fire);IF(HasStatus('SHIELD_MASTER') and HasActionResource('ReactionActionPoint', 1, 0, false)):DealDamage(2d10/2,Fire)
